output:
I close my eyes and I try to think of nothing.
As I'm playing the guitar but it's not the moment.
Outside it might be cold and inside it is so warm.
I stand up and see through the window.
People are already wearing their hats and gloves.
There is no reason to go on. Today I'm gonna stay. I'm gonna stay home.
I feel like I'm too numb and it's a pity to waste time this way.
I can't help it all. I'm in the head. I'm not really sure.
The only thing I've been known is that I want you to come home.
Come home.
